msg: HUNT: Gen87.X3 W3C Gesture Control Plane - Session start. Mission: MediaPipe → Physics → FSM → W3C Pointer → Any Target
HUNT: Found Gen83 Gold Baton REF__W3C_GESTURE_CONTROL_PLANE_GOLD_BATON.md in memory bank - complete architecture spec exists
HUNT: Tavily grounded W3C Pointer Events Level 3 (CR 2025-03-13) - pointerdown/move/up/cancel, pressure, tilt, capture
HUNT: Tavily grounded 1€ Filter (Casiez CHI 2012) - adaptive low-pass, fcmin=1Hz, beta=0.007, dcutoff=1Hz
HUNT: Tavily grounded XState v5 - setup() pattern, TypeScript native, guards/actions strongly typed
HUNT: Tavily grounded MediaPipe Tasks Vision - @mediapipe/tasks-vision, GestureRecognizer, 21 hand landmarks
HUNT: Created sandbox/specs/W3C_GESTURE_CONTROL_PLANE_SPEC.md with all Tavily sources
HUNT: Exploring TARGET ADAPTERS - user vision is Total Tool Virtualization (Port 1 Web Weaver domain)
HUNT: EXEMPLAR daedalOS (12.2K stars) - web desktop with v86, js-dos, EmulatorJS, BoxedWine built-in
HUNT: EXEMPLAR v86 input API - keyboard_send_scancodes(), bus.send('mouse-delta'), bus.send('mouse-click')
HUNT: EXEMPLAR js-dos Player API - setMouseSensitivity(n), setNoCursor(bool), mouse follows browser cursor
HUNT: EXEMPLAR EmulatorJS - EJS_defaultControls mapping, RetroArch libretro cores, WASM-based
HUNT: EXEMPLAR Excalidraw API - onPointerDown/Up/Update callbacks, React.PointerEvent exposure, embed via @excalidraw/excalidraw
HUNT: EXEMPLAR tldraw - renders to DOM not canvas (unlike Excalidraw), perfect-freehand ink, easier DOM event dispatch
HUNT: EXEMPLAR WinBox.js - 4KB zero-dep window manager, lightweight alternative to full daedalOS
HUNT: EXEMPLAR Puter (38K stars) - cloud OS, AGPL-3.0, full desktop in browser, launched March 2024
HUNT: KEY INSIGHT - iframe injection via element.dispatchEvent() same-origin, postMessage() cross-origin
HUNT: USER VISION CONFIRMED - MediaPipe → Physics (1€) → FSM (XState) → W3C Pointer → TargetAdapter → ANY TARGET
HUNT: Created PIPELINE_TRADE_STUDY.md - 5-stage matrix analysis with Mermaid diagrams
HUNT: Added Rapier physics engine - spring-damper smoothing + predictive lookahead for latency compensation
HUNT: Extended trade study with WebHID, Kalman, Behavior Trees, Pointer Lock API options
HUNT: Added OS-level targets - nut.js, robotjs, Tauri, Electron, Puter.js cloud OS
HUNT: Created STANDARDIZED OUTPUT CONTRACT - GestureEvent Zod schema with position/velocity/prediction/pointer fields
HUNT COMPLETE: 5W1H analysis done - MediaPipeRapierXStatePointerEventAdapter stack selected
ARCHITECTURE: Hexagonal CDD enforcement - ports/adapters with Zod contract validation
ENFORCEMENT: V-phase (Validate) = Mirror Magus (2) + Pyre Praetorian (5) hard gates, no escape hatches
INTERLOCK: EARS spec created - 25 requirements for Hexagonal CDD, Sequential Thinking + Tavily validated
HUNT TOOLING: XState VS Code ext found (stately.xstate-vscode) - partial v5 support, visual editor command
HUNT TOOLING: Playwright trace viewer ext found (ryanrosello-og.playwright-vscode-trace-viewer)
HUNT TOOLING: MCP ecosystem - microsoft/playwright-mcp official, @executeautomation/playwright-mcp-server (143 devices)
HUNT TOOLING: No dedicated MCP for MediaPipe/Rapier/Zod - use built-in debug methods (canvas overlay, debugRender, z.infer)
HUNT TOOLING COMPLETE: VS Code exts + MCP servers documented, ready for INTERLOCK phase
